title: #FuelCrisis: Public Transport in critical State
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Due to the lack of fuel, Public Transport services have been severely affected.
The most affected were school students, teachers, and office workers traveling to Colombo.
The Director of the National Transport Commission, Commander Nilan Mirenda Inter-provincial private bus services were reduced by 70% today (16).
Sri Lanka: Multiple protests in Colombo & suburbs demanding fuel
